body:
This is based heavily on #2624 and adds the alsa-lib and cups dependencies, if you'd like those separated into their own pull requests let me know.

This requires an existing icedtea or openjdk environment to compile. There's supposedly a way to accomplish this using ecj, but given that that's not included with gcc anymore it didn't seem like the best road to go down.
title: Add a new package for IcedTea
